
```{r}
z = lapply(bl, function(b){
  tf = file.path(tempdir(), basename(b$fn))
  writeBin(object = b$content, con = tf)
  downloadthis::download_file(
    path = tf,
    button_label = b$label,
    button_type = "primary",
    has_icon = TRUE,
    icon = glue::glue("fa fa-{b$icon}"),
    self_contained = FALSE,
    class = "button-buffer"
    )
})

do.call(tagList, z)

```
